abstract: In this paper, we discuss our efforts on SemEval-2023 Task4, a task to classify the human value categoriesthat an argument draws on. Arguments consist of a premise, conclusion,and the premiseâ€™s stance on the conclusion. Our team experimented with GloVe embeddings and fine-tuning BERT. We found that an ensembling of BERT and GloVe with RidgeRegression worked the best.
